p: Salt solutions were filtered through a nitrocellulose mixed ester membrane filter (pore size 1 µm, diameter 47 mm, Sterlitech). The filter was mounted onto a magnetic filtration cup (Pall) and secured to a 3‐piece manifold connected to an GAST vacuum pump (GAST Manufactured, Inc). All supplies were sterilized with 50% bleach or ELIMINase (Decon Labs) before filtration.
